metadata.description: Kip Burland is the latest in a long line of vigilante heroes that have worn the mask and carried on the tradition of The Black Hood. But in a world of ruthless villains, is a mask and a gun enough? Burland will find out as he goes toe-to-toe with criminal kingpins, highly-trained hitmen and more. Also featuring superstar artist Alex Toth's take on The Fox!
metadata.name: The Black Hood (Red Circle Comics)
